summary: A collection of helper utilities that underpin MAPDL session commands, providing file system operations, list‑mode handling, processor entry/exit orchestration, and comprehensive run‑control features such as job naming, GUI interaction, environment setup, memory/error tracking, and pause/resume management.
business_intent: Enable programmatic, reliable control of ANSYS MAPDL sessions for automation and workflow integration, simplifying resource handling, processor lifecycle management, and overall session behavior.
